Meetings.Raw: The meeting at the Knightsbridge Hall on Monday , May 18 , at 3.15 p.m. , will be addressed by Mrs. Dacre Fox and Miss K. Margesson . The chair will be taken by Mrs. Mansel . These meetings are for women only .

The meeting on Thursday , April 21 , at 8 p.m. , will be held at the Elysée Galleries , Queen's Road , Bayswater . The speaker at the meeting will be Miss P. Rickards . The chair will be taken by Miss Dorothy Gor- don . Men will be admitted to this meet- ing by ticket only .
